text: Hi folks, is there a way to update the _Manifest_ and _Project_ file of a specific package I am developing locally?

text: Can we cross post this publicly to <https://discourse.julialang.org|Discourse> for further visibility? React with :bridge: on the message above to approve. <https://github.com/JuliaCommunity/SlackBridge/blob/main/README.md#faq|More info here>

assuming you have `dev`-ed the package, you can `cd` to that directory, and `]activate .`. Then `]add`  will add to that project.toml. `]instantiate -p` will overwrite the manifest with a newly resolved one.

elements.text: will overwrite the manifest with a newly resolved one.

text: Yes. `add` will add packages to the currently activated environment. An environment is defined by the Project.toml.
